item.title: Venus Vacation PRISM: DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme ‘Illustrator Yom Exclusive Episodes’ trailer, details, and screenshots
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/venus-vacation-prism-dead-or-alive-xtreme-illustrator-yom-exclusive-episodes-trailer-details-and-screenshots

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5

Plus soft details and dressing up.

Publisher Koei Tecmo and developer Team NINJA have released a new trailer, information, and screenshots for Venus Vacation PRISM: DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme, introducing the collaboration episodes with illustrator Yom included in the Digital Deluxe Edition, as well as soft details and dressing up in the Owner’s Room.

Get the details below.

■ Key Visual

■ Immersive Soft Details!

With the latest graphics, details such as blushing skin, eye movements, and scenes where sand clings to the skin are rendered to make the girls appear more vibrant and captivating!

The franchise’s signature soft renditions have also evolved, allowing you to enjoy a more lifelike depiction of the skin’s texture.

—Dirty

—Blush

—Skin Gloss

—Tight Fit

■ Dress Up in the Owner’s Room!

Once you’ve obtained an outfit, you can freely change at the Owner’s Room. Some outfits even allow you to switch variations by adding or removing components!

■ Illustrator Yom Collaboration!

A collaboration with the popular illustrator Yom is revealed!

We have received special outfits designed by Yom.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes these collaboration outfits and episodes that can be used in-game!

Collaboration outfits available in the Digital Deluxe Edition! The tights, designed with special attention, can be changed in five denier levels (30, 40, 60, 80, and 110), and switch colors in black or beige! Once obtained, you can change outfits not only in collaboration episodes, but also in other episodes as well! Pay special attention to the detailed expression of the tights!

Collaboration Episodes

The Digital Deluxe Edition also has collaboration episodes in addition to the collaboration outfits. Experience special episodes tailored to the collaboration.

—Story

Venus Islands, a perpetual-summer paradise.

One day, you arrive at your office earlier than usual, only to be visited by Elise, a Venus and your supervisor. In her hands, she carries a large stack of business documents addressed to you.

That night, exhausted, you fall asleep, only to awaken to find a Venus adorned in a “special outfit.” Enjoy a unique and intimate moment, a special night in a tropical paradise, just for the two of you.

Venus Vacation PRISM: DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme is due out for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam and DMM Games Player on March 27 in Japan and Asia. For PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4, the Japanese release will only support Japanese as a language option, while the Asian release (which the official website labels as the “Global Version”) will support English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language options. The Steam version will also support these language options.

Watch the trailer below. View the screenshots at the gallery.

item.title: Twilight Monk launches in March
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/twilight-monk-launches-in-march

  • PC
  • Switch

PC demo now available for a limited time.

2.5D Metroidvania action RPG Twilight Monk will launch for Switch and PC via Steam in March for 2,200 yen, publisher Gravity Game Arise and developer Aquatic Moon announced. It will support English, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, French Italian, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, and Russian language options. A demo is available now for PC until March 3 as part of Steam Next Fest: February 2025 Edition.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Set in a hand-drawn world, this 2.5D action RPG blends Metroidvania exploration, RPG elements, and a sprawling overworld map. With dungeon hubs, narrative depth, and level-up mechanics, it offers freedom and classic adventure in a richly crafted fantasy setting.

Story

The land of Speria is shrouded in darkness, with monsters ravaging villages. Survivors gather at Crescent Isle’s monastery, seeking hope from the Moonken Monks. Raziel Tenza, a Twilight Monk descendant, must stop the traitor Nox and restore peace, as internal conflicts threaten even the monks’ unity.

Key Features

  • Satisfy Your Desire for Adventure as You Dive Into Intricate Dungeons – Each dungeon holds secrets and areas you can’t access initially. Gaining new skills unlocks hidden treasures, scrolls, secret passages, and puzzles, adding depth to your adventure.
  • Experience the Nostalgia of Classic JRPGs Through the Overworld Map and Towns! – While traversing the overhead world map connecting the dungeons, you’ll frequently encounter enemy monsters. When a battle breaks out, you’ll be teleported to a battle arena tailored to the surrounding terrain, offering combat experiences similar to those found during dungeon exploration. Be sure to explore every nook and cranny of the towns scattered across the world map to fully immerse yourself in the classic JRPG experience!
  • Become the Wielder of the “Phantom Pillar” – This mysterious artifact infused with ancient power, can be used for platforming, battle, blocking enemy attacks, or even to activate mechanisms and solve puzzles.
  • An Original World Brought to Life Through Hand-Drawn 2D Illustrations – Set in a hand-drawn world, this 2.5D action RPG blends Metroidvania exploration, RPG elements, and a sprawling overworld map. With dungeon hubs, narrative depth, and level-up mechanics, it offers freedom and classic adventure in a richly crafted fantasy setting.

item.title: Tekken 8 sales top three million; DLC character Anna Williams announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/tekken-8-sales-top-three-million-dlc-character-anna-williams-announced

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

The Scarlet Lightning returns.

Bandai Namco has announced Tekken 8 downloadable content character Anna Williams, who will launch on March 31 for Character Year 2 Pass owners and April 3 for all users. Sales of the game have also now surpassed three million units.

Tekken 8 was last reported in February 2024 to have sold two million units. According to Bandai Namco, the three million sales milestone was achieved at a faster pace than predecessor Tekken 7, which has sold over 12 million copies to date.

Following the release of Anna, the following additional downloadable content is planned via the “Season 2 Character & Stage Pass”:

  • Summer 2025 – New Stage and Character
  • Fall 2025 – New Character
  • Winter 2025 / 2026 – New Stage and Character

Tekken 8 launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on January 26, 2024.

item.title: Merchant 64 launches March 31
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/merchant-64-launches-march-31

  • PC

Low-poly 3D "teeny tiny adventure" game dated.

Low-poly 3D “teeny tiny adventure” game Merchant 64 will launch for PC via Steam on March 31, developer SuitNtie announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Merchant 64 a low-poly tiny retro-inspired traveling merchant game! Take control of Merchant as you buy goods at low prices and sell them in different towns at higher prices.

Key Features

  • A Cozy Tiny Adventure – This is a very small game that is designed to be a wonderful short adventure with multiple endings.
  • Make the Big Bucks – In this adventure take control of Merchant as you buy goods at low prices and sell them in different towns at higher prices.
  • Traverse Across Towns – As a traveling merchant you will need you will need explore the world and travel to new towns where you can sell your goods.
  • Purchase Upgrades – Through your adventure, purchase various upgrades to help out on your merchant journey!

item.title: despelote launches May 1
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/despelote-launches-may-1

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

First-person slice-of-life soccer adventure game dated.

First-person slice-of-life soccer adventure game despelote will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on May 1, publisher Panic and developers Julian Cordero and Sebastian Valbuena announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Panic:

About

despelote is a soccer game about people. Get immersed in the streets and parks of Quito through the eyes and ears of eight year old Julián. Dribble, pass and shoot your soccer ball around town, and see what happens when you kick it someone’s way. Feel the city change as Ecuador comes closer than ever to qualifying for the World Cup.

Key Features

  • A bittersweet and sometimes dreamy semi-autobiographical tale of youth.
  • Explore a dense town space at your leisure, full of activities, interactions, and mischief to get up to.
  • A physics-based soccer ball that feels good to kick around in a first-person perspective.
  • A vibrant world full of characters that have funny, and genuine conversations.
  • Photos and audio recorded on location in Ecuador are used to create a strong sense of place.
